title: Nucor Announces Share Repurchase Program and 170th Consecutive Cash Dividend
content:
SOURCE Nucor Corporation

CHARLOTTE, N.C. 

In a separate action, Nucor's board of directors declared the regular quarterly cash dividend of $0.3725 

Nucor and affiliates are manufacturers of steel products, with operating facilities primarily in the U.S. and Canada
